location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of the receipt of, and a reply to a previous communication which enclosed the Roll for a detachment of the Marine Battalion bound for Bushire on board the Minerva. It further notes the measures that the Resident has taken in order to maintain troop strength at the Residency at previous levels.
